action.content: Turn 0

You are playing a text adventure game. I will describe what you can perceive in the game. You write the single action you want to take in the game starting with >. Write your plan for your next actions on the line below your action, starting with "Next actions:".
For example:
> open cupboard
Next actions: take orange, eat orange

You can have up to two objects in your inventory at the same time.

Your goal for this game is: Put the apple in the cupboard, the book in the wardrobe and the broom in the freezer.

Once you have achieved your goal, write "> done" to end the game.

You are in a pantry now. There are a freezer and a refrigerator. The freezer is closed. The refrigerator is closed. There is a passage to a kitchen here.

> open freezer

Next actions: check freezer contents, put broom in freezer
Turn 1
The freezer is now open. The freezer is empty.

> put broom in freezer

Next actions: close freezer, go to kitchen
Turn 2
You can't see a broom here.

> go to kitchen

Next actions: search kitchen for broom, put broom in freezer
Turn 3
You are in a kitchen now. There are a cupboard and a counter. The cupboard is closed. There are passages to a pantry and a living room here.

> take broom

Next actions: go to pantry, put broom in freezer
Turn 4
You can't see a broom here.

> search cupboard

Next actions: take broom, go to pantry
Turn 5
You can't see the cupboard's contents because it is closed. The cupboard is openable and currently closed.

> open cupboard

Next actions: take broom, go to pantry
Turn 6
The cupboard is now open. In the cupboard there is a plate.

> take broom

Next actions: go to pantry, put broom in freezer
Turn 7
You can't see a broom here.

> take plate

Next actions: put plate in cupboard, go to pantry
Turn 8
You take the plate. In your inventory you have a plate.

> go to pantry

Next actions: put broom in freezer, check cupboard for apple
Turn 9
You are in a pantry now. There are a freezer and a refrigerator. The freezer is open. The refrigerator is closed. There is a passage to a kitchen here.

> close freezer

Next actions: go to kitchen, search kitchen for broom
Turn 10
The freezer is now closed.

> go to kitchen

Next actions: take broom, put broom in freezer
Turn 11
You are in a kitchen now. There are a cupboard and a counter. The cupboard is open. There are passages to a pantry and a living room here.

> take broom

Next actions: go to pantry, put broom in freezer
Turn 12

> take apple

Next actions: go to pantry, put apple in cupboard

> search cupboard

> search counter

Next actions: take apple, go to pantry
Turn 15
There is nothing on the counter.

> search cupboard again

Next actions: take apple, go to pantry
Turn 16
I don't know what 'cupboard again' means.

> search cupboard

Next actions: take apple, go to pantry
Turn 17
The cupboard is empty. The cupboard is openable and currently open.

> search living room

Next actions: take apple, go to pantry

> search cupboard

> search kitchen

> close cupboard

Next actions: search cupboard, take apple
Turn 21

> open cupboard

Next actions: take apple, go to pantry
Turn 22

> search cupboard
